sources.title: Slender (Full Movie) Mystery, Horror, Slenderman
sources.description:
Two filmmakers searching for the perfect documentary subject come across a chilling story of a woman who claims that her children were abducted by a mysterious suited man.   At first, they dismiss the woman as crazy, but when the terrifyingly unexplainable occurs, they are exposed to the horrifying truth that something IS out there, and it’s coming for them.

Directed by Joel Petrie
2016
Starring Joel Petrie, Dan Schovaers, Mili Parks
